ARABIC: رَّبَّنَا ٱكْشِفْ عَنَّا ٱلْعَذَابَ إِنَّا مُؤْمِنُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Our Lord, remove the punishment from us. We are really muminun.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: O Lord, take away this torment from us," (they will pray); "we have come to believe."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (People will then say): “Our Lord, remove this scourge from us; we shall believe.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Lord, remove this torment from us for we are believers".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Thereupon they will say, “O our Lord! Remove the punishment from us – we now accept faith.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: (They will say): "Our Lord! Remove the torment from us, really we shall become believers!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Our Lord! remove from us the punishment; surely we are believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: O our Lord, remove Thou from us the chastisement; we are believers.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: (Then they will say): Our Lord relieve us of the torment. Lo! we are believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Then they will say, "Lord, relieve us from this torment, for truly we are now believers in You."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Our Lord! remove from us the torment, verily we shall become believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Our Lord! Remove this punishment from us. Indeed we have believed!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (They will say:) "Our Lord! remove the Penalty from us, for we do really believe!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (They will say): "Our Lord! Remove the torment from us, really we shall become believers!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Our Lord, remove this punishment from us, we are believers'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “Our Lord, lift the torment from us, we are believers.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [They will say], "Our Lord, remove from us the torment; indeed, we are believers."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [44:12] Our Lord, relieve us from the chastisement; indeed we have believed’, we have [now] affirmed the sincerity of Your Prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: ((Then they will say): Our Lord relieve us of the torment) remove from us hunger. (Lo! we are believers) in You as well as in Your Messenger and Scripture:
